extendedInfo.description: Compatible with Android Level 2.0 and up. A database of the standard physical constants useful for students and professionals who commonly compute solutions for problems in the physical sciences. This useful reference provides a user friendly search mechanism for finding values of the various constants, the uncertainty in their measure, and their associated units. Plus, the application suggests potential results while searching lessening the amount of time spent. All the values that this reference supplies are represented in scientific notation with at least three significant figures.
